TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You are stuck in the 4th or 5th dimension

i wish to feel better

021207022023

oo new page!

Edited July 2, 2023 by AlamoVampire

Granted, but you are incapable of actually experiencing it.

I wish I had a cup of coffee.

Granted but you can never drink it

i wish to go

232407022023

Granted: You are now a Bear in the woods.

I wish you could see what I have seen through your eyes.

Granted, but you also see what ive seen, felt what ive felt, and know now why i feel like a sin eater and a universal beating bag.

i wish i had not known love and lost, to know what that loss is

055107032023

Granted: You are now a Butter Bot. Used by Rick one time, just to be thrown away.

I wish the reference to be known.

Granted but rick and morty are cancelled

(had to google it lol)

i wish to go back back to the

061507032023

Granted in the past, which makes the present the future.

I wish I wasn't so tired.

Granted, you now have the energy of 100,000 children as well as Taz.

i wish i had a hug from my kitty

052007042023

Granted; it was not your kitty, though, and now, you have scratches all around your body.

I wish I have more time

Granted, you will live until the heat death of the universe and then survive beyond it. You however can no longer interact with the universe.

i wish to hear my first kitties meow and purr again. A pair of sounds ive not heard since her purr fell silent in 2016. I miss her  

now for the wish suitable for the thread:

i wish to see the edge of the universe

045307052023

Granted. Just look around.

I wish there was not just Thorium, but also Frejium.

Granted you get converted into it.

i wish we all could have our favorite dish to eat

054307052023

Granted.  Everyone gets their favorite dish to eat, and the dish is never empty.  We are all forced to continuously eat ourselves to death.

I wish I had a death star.

Granted. You have a Death Star, and you live on Alderan.

I wish for more wishes.

Granted. This although doesn't mean more abilities.

I wish to have a look at real historical medieval.

Granted. You end up in prison at the tower of london for witchcraft.

i wish to be a shinigami

232407052023

Granted. You are a kawaii version of shinigami, and hunt the butterflies.

I wish butterflies were literally butter-rich and edible..

Granted you get a tub of I Cant Believe Its Not Butterfly, the butterfly butter substitute. You get a tub of this every hour on the hour forever.

i wish to know the answer

001807062023

Granted: 42

I wish to write a best seller.

Granted you write a phone book

i wish to be a super conductor

063107062023

Granted. Your conductivity is 0.005 Ohm.

I wish liquid helium was flying.

Granted but it requires liquid lead

i wish it said

141207062023

Granted, it said the following: meow!

I wish you would

Spoiler

also...

On 7/5/2023 at 5:53 PM, AlamoVampire said:

i wish to hear my first kitties meow and purr again. A pair of sounds ive not heard since her purr fell silent in 2016. I miss her  

I understand your struggle  I recently lost 5 kittens because they probably went away, but I'm still letting myself believe they're somewhere around

Granted.  You would, but you can't.  And don't want to.

I wish she was.
